## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Solyc04g009800](https://solgenomics.net/locus/Solyc04g009800/view)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LeCDPK2</u><u>SlCDPK2</u>
- **Gene Name:** Calcium-dependent protein kinase2
- **Genome:** [Tomato Genome version SL4.0](https://solgenomics.net/organism/solanum_lycopersicum/genome)
- **Species:** *Solanum lycopersicum*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - A calcium-dependent protein kinase (CDPK), **SlCDPK2**, was isolated as one of the protein kinases that are able to phosphorylate LeACS2 at Ser-460.
   - **SlCDPK2** encoded 581 amino acids with a predicted molecular mass of 64602Da. **SlCDPK2** was classified into Group I of the CDPK family.
   - NusAâ€“**SlCDPK2** also phosphorylated LeACS1A, LeACS3, and LeACS6, which possess putative CDPK phosphorylation sites, but not LeACS4, which does not contain a phosphorylation site.
